sentences.english: He is a temple to the half a tank of water drank.
sentences.chinese: 他一到庙里，就把半缸水喝光了。

sentences.english: Like drinking up a whole bottle of contaminated mineral water.
sentences.chinese: 例如把整瓶不洁的矿泉水喝光。

sentences.english: Between them they drank away every cent.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩把身上的钱都喝光了。

sentences.english: The thirsty porter uncovered the kettle , and then drank the juice until the last drop.
sentences.chinese: 那位口渴的搬运工揭开壶盖，把一壶果汁喝光了。

sentences.english: B:I just drove it out of the kitchen.It had drunk all the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我刚刚把它从厨房赶出去，它喝光了所有的酒。

sentences.english: They voraciously drank all the edible and potable water at one time.
sentences.chinese: 他们贪婪地一下就喝光所有的可食用的饮用水。

sentences.english: I always recommend that you use up any coffee you buy within a week of opening the package.
sentences.chinese: 我建议最好开封一个星期以内就把所有咖啡喝光。

sentences.english: He drinks all of my milk.
sentences.chinese: 他把我们的牛奶喝光了。

sentences.english: He drank up a whole litre of beer.
sentences.chinese: 他把一升啤酒都喝光了。

sentences.english: We had drunk all of our water on the way and did not have even a drop left.
sentences.chinese: 我们在路上喝光了所有的水，一滴也没有留下。

sentences.english: He swooped upon them earnestly and drank the whole river.
sentences.chinese: 夸父也就一口气把河里的水全喝光了。

sentences.english: He took off a pint of beer in one draught.
sentences.chinese: 他一口气喝光了一品脱啤酒。

sentences.english: He drank the wine at once and laid himself down on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他不一会儿就喝光了酒，倒在地板上。

sentences.english: He drank up all the water.

sentences.chinese: 他喝光自己的第四杯波旁威士忌。

sentences.english: He finished off all the milk and I had to drink black coffee.
sentences.chinese: 他把牛奶喝光了，我只得喝清咖啡。

definition: to drain the cup in one gulp (idiom)
jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)
to unscrew/to twist off (a lid)/to turn on (a faucet)/to switch on (by turning a knob)/to turn (a door handle)/to wrench apart
